name: frequently_lt_nhds
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
a : α
inst✝ : (nhdsWithin a (Set.Iio a)).NeBot
⊢ Filter.Frequently (fun x => LT.lt x a) (nhds a)
decl:
lemma frequently_lt_nhds (a : α) [NeBot (𝓝[<] a)] : ∃ᶠ x in 𝓝 a, x < a :=
  frequently_iff_neBot.2 ‹_›

name: frequently_gt_nhds
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
a : α
inst✝ : (nhdsWithin a (Set.Ioi a)).NeBot
⊢ Filter.Frequently (fun x => LT.lt a x) (nhds a)
decl:
lemma frequently_gt_nhds (a : α) [NeBot (𝓝[>] a)] : ∃ᶠ x in 𝓝 a, a < x :=
  frequently_iff_neBot.2 ‹_›

name: Filter.Eventually.exists_lt
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
a : α
inst✝ : (nhdsWithin a (Set.Iio a)).NeBot
p : α → Prop
h : Filter.Eventually (fun x => p x) (nhds a)
⊢ Exists fun b => And (LT.lt b a) (p b)

name: Filter.Eventually.exists_gt
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
a : α
inst✝ : (nhdsWithin a (Set.Ioi a)).NeBot
p : α → Prop
h : Filter.Eventually (fun x => p x) (nhds a)
⊢ Exists fun b => And (GT.gt b a) (p b)

name: nhdsWithin_Ici_neBot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : α
H₂ : LE.le a b
⊢ (nhdsWithin b (Set.Ici a)).NeBot
decl:
theorem nhdsWithin_Ici_neBot {a b : α} (H₂ : a ≤ b) : NeBot (𝓝[Ici a] b) :=
  nhdsWithin_neBot_of_mem H₂

name: nhdsGE_neBot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : Preorder α
a : α
⊢ (nhdsWithin a (Set.Ici a)).NeBot
decl: instance nhdsGE_neBot (a : α) : NeBot (𝓝[≥] a) := nhdsWithin_Ici_neBot (le_refl a)

name: nhdsWithin_Ici_self_neBot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : Preorder α
a : α
⊢ (nhdsWithin a (Set.Ici a)).NeBot
decl:
@[deprecated nhdsGE_neBot (since := "2024-12-21")]
theorem nhdsWithin_Ici_self_neBot (a : α) : NeBot (𝓝[≥] a) := nhdsGE_neBot a

α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : α
H : LE.le a b
⊢ (nhdsWithin a (Set.Iic b)).NeBot
decl:
theorem nhdsWithin_Iic_neBot {a b : α} (H : a ≤ b) : NeBot (𝓝[Iic b] a) :=
  nhdsWithin_neBot_of_mem H

initialProofState:
α : Type u_1

name: nhdsLT_le_nhdsNE
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : Preorder α
a : α
⊢ LE.le (nhdsWithin a (Set.Iio a)) (nhdsWithin a (HasCompl.compl (Singleton.singleton a)))
decl:
theorem nhdsLT_le_nhdsNE (a : α) : 𝓝[<] a ≤ 𝓝[≠] a :=
  nhdsWithin_mono a fun _ => ne_of_lt

name: IsAntichain.interior_eq_empty
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : ∀ (x : α), (nhdsWithin x (Set.Iio x)).NeBot
s : Set α
hs : IsAntichain (fun x1 x2 => LE.le x1 x2) s
⊢ Eq (interior s) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection
decl:
lemma IsAntichain.interior_eq_empty [∀ x : α, (𝓝[<] x).NeBot] {s : Set α}
    (hs : IsAntichain (· ≤ ·) s) : interior s = ∅ := by
  refine eq_empty_of_forall_not_mem fun x hx ↦ ?_
  have : ∀ᶠ y in 𝓝 x, y ∈ s := mem_interior_iff_mem_nhds.1 hx
  rcases this.exists_lt with ⟨y, hyx, hys⟩
  exact hs hys (interior_subset hx) hyx.ne hyx.le

name: IsAntichain.interior_eq_empty'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : ∀ (x : α), (nhdsWithin x (Set.Ioi x)).NeBot
s : Set α
hs : IsAntichain (fun x1 x2 => LE.le x1 x2) s
⊢ Eq (interior s) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection
decl:
lemma IsAntichain.interior_eq_empty' [∀ x : α, (𝓝[>] x).NeBot] {s : Set α}
    (hs : IsAntichain (· ≤ ·) s) : interior s = ∅ :=
  have : ∀ x : αᵒᵈ, NeBot (𝓝[<] x) := ‹_›
  hs.to_dual.interior_eq_empty

name: continuousWithinAt_Ioi_iff_Ici
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : PartialOrder α
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace β
a : α
f : α → β
⊢ Iff (ContinuousWithinAt f (Set.Ioi a) a) (ContinuousWithinAt f (Set.Ici a) a)
decl:
theorem continuousWithinAt_Ioi_iff_Ici {a : α} {f : α → β} :
    ContinuousWithinAt f (Ioi a) a ↔ ContinuousWithinAt f (Ici a) a := by
  simp only [← Ici_diff_left, continuousWithinAt_diff_self]

name: continuousWithinAt_Iio_iff_Iic
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : PartialOrder α
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace β
a : α
f : α → β
⊢ Iff (ContinuousWithinAt f (Set.Iio a) a) (ContinuousWithinAt f (Set.Iic a) a)

name: nhdsLE_sup_nhdsGE
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LinearOrder α
a : α
⊢ Eq (Max.max (nhdsWithin a (Set.Iic a)) (nhdsWithin a (Set.Ici a))) (nhds a)
decl:
theorem nhdsLE_sup_nhdsGE (a : α) : 𝓝[≤] a ⊔ 𝓝[≥] a = 𝓝 a := by
  rw [← nhdsWithin_union, Iic_union_Ici, nhdsWithin_univ]

decl: @[deprecated (since := "2024-12-21")] alias nhds_left_sup_nhds_right := nhdsLE_sup_nhdsGE

name: nhdsWithin_right_sup_nhds_singleton
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1

inst✝ : LinearOrder α
a : α
⊢ Eq (Max.max (nhdsWithin a (Set.Ioi a)) (nhdsWithin a (Singleton.singleton a))) (nhdsWithin a (Set.Ici a))
decl:
lemma nhdsWithin_right_sup_nhds_singleton (a : α) :
    𝓝[>] a ⊔ 𝓝[{a}] a = 𝓝[≥] a := by
  simp only [union_singleton, Ioi_insert, ← nhdsWithin_union]

name: continuousAt_iff_continuous_left_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder α
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace β
a : α
f : α → β
⊢ Iff (ContinuousAt f a) (And (ContinuousWithinAt f (Set.Iic a) a) (ContinuousWithinAt f (Set.Ici a) a))
decl:
theorem continuousAt_iff_continuous_left_right {a : α} {f : α → β} :
    ContinuousAt f a ↔ ContinuousWithinAt f (Iic a) a ∧ ContinuousWithinAt f (Ici a) a := by
  simp only [ContinuousWithinAt, ContinuousAt, ← tendsto_sup, nhdsLE_sup_nhdsGE]

name: continuousAt_iff_continuous_left'_right'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder α
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace β
a : α
f : α → β
⊢ Iff (ContinuousAt f a) (And (ContinuousWithinAt f (Set.Iio a) a) (ContinuousWithinAt f (Set.Ioi a) a))
decl:
theorem continuousAt_iff_continuous_left'_right' {a : α} {f : α → β} :
    ContinuousAt f a ↔ ContinuousWithinAt f (Iio a) a ∧ ContinuousWithinAt f (Ioi a) a := by
  rw [continuousWithinAt_Ioi_iff_Ici, continuousWithinAt_Iio_iff_Iic,
    continuousAt_iff_continuous_left_right]
